The HOLD recommendation reflects a cautious approach, acknowledging the possibility of growth if positive legal and market developments occur, balanced against the high volatility and regulatory uncertainties. Investors should monitor the SEC and legal developments closely, as these will be critical in determining XRP's future trajectory.
